resources.string: Type any text and press send. The same text will be sent back with server informations.
Try to turn off the network, type some text several times then press send. Every requests will be sent as soon as you turn your network back on.
Choose between JSON and XML then press send. Java Person class instances will be serialized with your chosen file format, sent back by the server, deserialized then displayed as java objects.
Push the fetch button to show a list of authors. You can then click on an author to see his posts.
